creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
marks: [ 上下左右直前直後前後？析風？？月？？法合咸歹？？合生命根源差異存在体驗破壊青山運歩東山水上石女？
medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink on paper
text: After a successful carreer as a Western-style painter, Kokuta changed his direction in the 1950's and moved to the world of abstract paintings. He also became well-known for his unconventional, bold, and powerful calligraphy that reflects his study of Zen.
title: Words Concerned with Existence
